data.text: @maingi_zadok Don't worry, we are aware of the challenge & it was being resolved today for supply to resume on Friday. Kindly feel free to report any no water cases immediately they occur on days you should receive water also note the current system haul we announced that affect normal supply

@Kacwasco Funnily, on the day you held this meeting @Kacwasco , Most parts of Kakamega Town lacked cleans and safe water. 
Mwiyala-Embwabwa route, we only received water for less than 30 minutes late at night and  less than 1 hr very early in the morning.

A debt mgt plan was agreed upon by the suppliers. A resource mobilization strategy is also now in place to manage the targets. She recognized the suppliers as key stakeholders for KACWASCO growth as they play an integral part in the operations and maintenance services of the WSP
